item.title: Transfer rumors, news: Neymar eyes Europe, MLS move for World Cup
item.description: Santos forward Neymar is set to consider a move back to Europe or MLS if he doesn't stay in Brazil. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

item.title: Sources: Ailing Colts to work out retired QB Rivers
item.description: The Indianapolis Colts will work out retired quarterback Philip Rivers on Tuesday, sources confirmed to ESPN.
